definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: Had done, it is its devoir.
I guarantee that you'll like this book.
sentences.chinese: 我管保這件事情能辦好。

sentences.english: First, countries should, first and foremost, run their own affairs well.
sentences.chinese: 第一，各國首先要把自己的事情辦好。

sentences.english: Actually manage the existing foreign-invested enterprises well.
sentences.chinese: 切實辦好現有外商投資企業。

sentences.english: He gave his solemn promise to do better.
sentences.chinese: 他莊重地保證把事情辦好。

sentences.english: I hope you can hold this case down like David.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你能像大衛那樣把這個案子順利地辦好。

sentences.english: You've sold your house before you've got your emigration clearance to go to Australia?
sentences.chinese: 你還沒辦好去澳大利亞的移民簽證就把房子賣了？

sentences.english: Get the job done in three days.
Host the grand sporting event well. Develop Hainan province intoaharmonious and prosperous special economic zone.
sentences.chinese: 辦好品牌賽事，繁榮特區經濟，構建和諧海南。

sentences.english: Do you cooperate with coworkers to get things done?
sentences.chinese: 你是否能和同事齊心協力將事情辦好？

sentences.english: As soon as they returned home, the marriage was concluded.
sentences.chinese: 他們回家後很快就辦好了婚事。

sentences.english: Travel agencies can complete the procedures even faster.
sentences.chinese: 旅行社可以較快地辦好這些手續。

sentences.english: African Commodities Exhibitions shall be organized well to enlarge the two-way flow of goods.
sentences.chinese: 辦好非洲商品展覽會，擴大雙向貨物貿易。

sentences.english: There are some people who believe that if you want something done right, you’d better do it yourself.
sentences.chinese: 有些人認爲想把事辦好就得親自動手。

sentences.english: Is he drawing back before the good which he can do?
sentences.chinese: 在能辦好事時難道可以退卻嗎？

sentences.english: In China, people buy things for the Spring Festival one month ahead of the year.
sentences.chinese: 中國人習慣在春節前一個月就辦好年貨。
